rows.label: tev001492_MSG0001
rows.name: [ST:playername ]! Just who I wanted to see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0002
rows.name:
That dog of yours was wandering around,
so I tried to bring him back to your place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0003
rows.name:
But then he started barking and growling at me like
some kind of mad indigen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0004
rows.name: What the hell is WRONG with that mutt?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_JNK0010
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: tev001492_SEL0011
rows.name: Say you're sorry for not training him better.

rows.label: tev001492_JNK0020
rows.name: Scold

rows.label: tev001492_SEL0021
rows.name: Chastise Irina for making your dog feel threatened.

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0005
rows.name: I don't think training was the problem, exactly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, who am I kidding. This always happens.
Animals have hated me for as long as I can remember.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0007
rows.name:
No matter how nice I am, they always act like this.
I've never even gotten close enough to pet one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0008
rows.name: I made him feel threatened? I didn't DO anything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0009
rows.name:
I just approached him as slowly as I could and tried to
gently put my hand on one of his little ears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, forget it. I just wish I could handle dogs the way
you and Lin do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0011
rows.name:
You gotta teach me the trick! I mean, I'm an Interceptor
who squares off against indigens all day, you know?
It can't be THAT hard![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0012
rows.name:
If I knew your trick, I'm sure I could win over at least
one of the dogs in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_JNK0030
rows.name: Teach Aggressiveness

rows.label: tev001492_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Irina that the secret is to charge right
at the dog while screaming loudly.

rows.label: tev001492_JNK0040
rows.name: Teach Calmness

rows.label: tev001492_SEL0041
rows.name: Advise Irina to lower her guard and reveal her true self.

rows.label: tev001492_JNK0050
rows.name: Teach Bribery

rows.label: tev001492_SEL0051
rows.name: Advise Irina to woo the dog with food.

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0013
rows.name:
All right! I'm actually GOOD at that!
Okay, lemme try it. Ready... Set...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0014
rows.name:
HERE, DOGGY DOGGY DOGGY!
GWWWWAAAALLLLRRRRRGH!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Auuuuugh! Now it totally hates me more than before![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0017
rows.name: Dammit! I'm never gonna be able to pet a dog![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0018
rows.name:
I just want to cuddle a pet once in my freaking life.
Is that too much to ask?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0019
rows.name:
"Lower my guard?" As if I'M the one who's afraid?
That's absurd.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0020
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0021
rows.name:
Okay, maybe it's not quite SO ridiculous.
I guess there was an...incident when I was young.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0022
rows.name:
I tried to pet a dog I didn't know, and got bit.
The experience drove me to toughen up.
...Or maybe it just made me afraid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0023
rows.name: Okay then. I'll try to relax and just...talk to it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0024
rows.name:
Hey there, little guy. So, um, I'm not your enemy,
okay? And you're not my enemy. We're buds![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0025
rows.name:
So what do you think? Can we be friends?
I'd really like to pet your big fuzzy ears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0027
rows.name: Huh. He stopped barking. And his tail is wagging.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0028
rows.name: That's good! Er, it won't run away now, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0029
rows.name:
Then you can leave the rest to me!
I'll make sure to see him safely back home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0030
rows.name:
Wow, I finally get to pet a dog.
Thank you, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0031
rows.name: Oh, okay! I'll just give it the rest of my ration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0032
rows.name:
Here ya go, buddy. One dense, flavorless nutrient bar.
Er, it doesn't smell very good. Or taste good, actually.
But it IS full of minerals and junk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0034
rows.name:
He won't even touch it! And I think he actually hates
me more than he did before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0035
rows.name: Dammit! I'm never gonna be able to pet a dog![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001492_MSG0036
rows.name:
I just want to cuddle a pet once in my freaking life.
Is that too much to ask?[ST:wait ]
